text: Balo -- ''amara kache ya pratyadista hayeche tate ami khadakera jan'ya nisid'dha pa'i ni ta khete e'isaba byatita -- ya mrta haye geche, athaba jhare para rakta, athaba sukarera mansa, -- kenana ta nihsandeha asuci, athaba ya halala kara hayeche tara upare allah chara an'ya nama ne'oyara papacare, kinta ye ke'u cape pareche, abadhya na haye ba matra na chariye, tabe tomara prabhu nihsandeha paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
